item.title: Ranged weapons
item.dc:creator: @sexyrussian sexyrussian
item.description:
@sexyrussian wrote:

when i change the hitdiff in my special attacks of ranged weapons, like dark bow, magic short bow or my rune knifes,

the hitdiff has no effect

if((playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 868 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 867) && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 256, 1074); hitDiff = 100 + misc.random(maxRangeHit2());

}


this does normal damage. it doesnt do the 100 -.-

how do i make my hitdiffs have impact on how high i hit?

Read full topic
